statements: SELECT * FROM regions;
SELECT region_id, region_name FROM regions WHERE region_id = 1;
SELECT region_name, country FROM regions WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT * FROM regions WHERE population > 1000000;
SELECT region_id AS id, region_name AS name FROM regions ORDER BY country DESC;
SELECT region_id, region_name, country, population FROM regions ORDER BY region_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM regions WHERE population > 100000 ORDER BY country ASC;
SELECT region_name, country FROM regions WHERE population BETWEEN 50000 AND 100000 ORDER BY region_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM regions WHERE country = 'USA' OR country = 'Canada' ORDER BY population DESC;
SELECT region_id, region_name FROM regions WHERE country LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY region_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM regions;
SELECT region_name, country FROM regions WHERE region_id = 1;
SELECT region_id, income_range, gender FROM demographic_data WHERE age_group = '18-25';
SELECT * FROM regions ORDER BY region_name DESC;
SELECT region_name, country FROM regions WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT * FROM regions WHERE region_id = 1;
SELECT region_name, country FROM regions ORDER BY country DESC;
SELECT region_name, count(*) as total_count FROM regions GROUP BY region_name HAVING total_count > 1;
SELECT d.age_group, d.gender, r.region_name FROM demographic_data d JOIN regions r ON d.region_id = r.region_id;
SELECT r.region_name, d.age_group, d.income_range FROM regions r JOIN demographic_data d ON r.region_id = d.region_id WHERE d.gender = 'Male';
SELECT * FROM regions;
SELECT region_name, population FROM regions WHERE population > 100000;
SELECT demographic_category, percentage FROM demographic_data ORDER BY percentage DESC;
SELECT ad_content FROM ads_targeting WHERE region_id = 2;
SELECT DISTINCT region_name FROM regions;
SELECT * FROM regions ORDER BY population DESC, region_name
SELECT demographic_category, percentage FROM demographic_data WHERE percentage > 50
SELECT ad_content, region_name FROM ads_targeting JOIN regions ON ads_targeting.region_id = regions.region_id
SELECT region_name, demographic_category FROM regions JOIN demographic_data ON regions.region_id = demographic_data.region_id
SELECT region_name, COUNT(ad_id) AS num_ads FROM regions LEFT JOIN ads_targeting ON regions.region_id = ads_targeting.region_id GROUP BY region_name
SELECT * FROM Region;
SELECT region_name, region_id FROM Region WHERE region_id = '12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789012';
SELECT ad_name, ad_content FROM Advertisements ORDER BY ad_name DESC;
SELECT ad_id, ad_name, region_id FROM Advertisements WHERE region_id = '87654321-4321-4321-4321-210987654321';
SELECT ad_id, ad_name, ad_content FROM Advertisements WHERE ad_name LIKE '%Sale%';
SELECT * FROM Region;
SELECT region_id, region_name FROM Region ORDER BY region_name DESC;
SELECT ad_name, ad_content FROM Advertisements WHERE ad_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
SELECT MIN(income), MAX(income) FROM DemographicData GROUP BY region_id;
SELECT ad_name, COUNT(user_id) AS num_views FROM Advertisements JOIN AdTracking ON Advertisements.ad_id = AdTracking.ad_id GROUP BY ad_name ORDER BY num_views DESC;
SELECT id, gender, age, income FROM DemographicData;
SELECT region_name, country, population FROM GeographicRegions WHERE country='USA';
SELECT advertiser_name, industry FROM Advertisers ORDER BY industry;
SELECT ad_id, ad_name, ad_type FROM Advertisements WHERE advertiser_id=1;
SELECT ad_id, gender, age_group FROM TargetedAds WHERE region_id=5;
SELECT * FROM DemographicData WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY income DESC;
SELECT ad_name, ad_type, advertiser_name FROM Advertisements JOIN Advertisers ON Advertisements.advertiser_id = Advertisers.advertiser_id;
SELECT * FROM DemographicData WHERE gender = 'Female' AND income > 50000 AND age < 40;
SELECT ad_name, ad_type, Advertisers.industry FROM Advertisements JOIN Advertisers ON Advertisements.advertiser_id = Advertisers.advertiser_id WHERE Advertisers.industry = 'Fashion';
SELECT region_name, country, population FROM GeographicRegions ORDER BY population DESC;
